name: Poplar Grove Airmotive, Inc.
about: Poplar Grove Airmotive, Inc., located at Poplar Grove Airport in Illinois, is a comprehensive aviation facility offering a range of services including flight training, aircraft maintenance, and rentals. Our flight school provides evening ground school courses and computerized testing for Private, Instrument, and Commercial certificates. Students train in our well-maintained rental aircraft, ensuring a safe and effective learning environment. We also offer advanced professional training for Commercial Licenses, Instrument Ratings, and Certified Flight Instructor Ratings. With a commitment to quality and safety, Poplar Grove Airmotive is the ideal launching point for your aviation career. Contact us to start your journey to the skies.
